english.key: Only lowercase letters, numbers, and the special character '_' are allowed. The string cannot start with a number or use the special character '_' twice consecutively. The size of the string should must a length between 2 and 40.
english.key_sensitive: Only letters, numbers, and the special character '_' are allowed. The string cannot start with a number or use the special character '_' twice consecutively. The size of the string must be a length between 2 and 40.
english.key_sensitive2: Only letters, numbers, and the special character '_' are allowed. The string cannot use the special character '_' twice consecutively. The size of the string must be a length between 2 and 40.
english.name: Only letters, spaces, numbers and the following special characters (- /. &) are allowed. The size of the string must be a length between 2 and 50.
english.name_free: Only letters, spaces, numbers and the following special characters (- /. &) are allowed.
english.password: The password must contain at least one number, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one of the following special characters (#?! @ $% ^ & * -). The size of the string must be a length between 8 and 40.
english.alert: Only one of the following keywords is allowed: 'info', 'danger', 'warning' or 'success'.
english.url: The string must be in URL format.
english.postgres_type: Only one of the following keywords is allowed: 'json', 'float', 'text' 'int' or 'boolean'.
english.property: Only numbers, upper and lower case letters and the special character '_' are allowed. The string cannot start with a number. The size of the string must be a length between 1 and 40.
english.status_a_s: Only one of the following values ​​is allowed: 'A' (Activate) and 'S' (Suspend).
english.status_a_p: Only one of the following values ​​is allowed: 'A' (Activate) and 'P' (Pending).
english.mtc: The following characters are not allowed (^&/\<>"';).
english.int: The string must have an integer number format
english.float: The string must have an decimal number format
english.email: The string must be in email format
english.js_type: Only one of the following keywords is allowed: 'object', 'number', 'boolean' or 'string'.
